sentences.en: ...a process of social, economic and political change which involves the totality of human experience.
sentences.cn: ...一个涉及人类经验总和的社会、经济和政治变革过程。

sentences.en: a deeper exploration of life in its totality.
sentences.cn: 对生命总体的更深层的探索。

sentences.en: Confucianism in its totality is enlightening and uplifting.
sentences.cn: 儒家思想在整体上是开明和振奋人心的.

sentences.en: Cosmology: The study of the physical universe considered as a totality of phenomena in time and space.
sentences.cn: 宇宙学: 把有形的宇宙当做时空中的各种现象的总和来研究的科学.

sentences.en: Even confronting the self in its totality.
sentences.cn: 甚至在它的总体中,遭遇自我.

sentences.en: Its methodology consists of functional decomposition and the integration of analysis and totality.
sentences.cn: 其方法的核心是功能分解及分析性与整体性相结合.

sentences.en: Literature is deeply rooted and intertwined with life's totality.
sentences.cn: 文学作品始终是同大众生活根深蒂固的交织在一起的.

sentences.en: The seriousness of the situation is difficult to appreciate in its totality .
sentences.cn: 很难从全局上理解局势的严重性。

sentences.en: The standard of beauty is the entire circuit of natural forms, the totality of nature.
sentences.cn: 美的标准是自然界各种形体整个的变化顺序, 即:自然界的总汇.

sentences.en: The totality of existence atomic facts also determines which atomic facts do not exist.
sentences.cn: 05存在的原子事实的总和也确定了所谓的不存在.

sentences.en: The totality of existing states of affairs is the world.
sentences.cn: 存在的事态是事实,诸事实的整体是世界.说过了的老话.

sentences.en: The totality of space could be infinite.
sentences.cn: 整个空间其实可以是无限大的.

sentences.en: The totality of this work was obscure to computer science and completely unknown in biology.
sentences.cn: 总体而言,计算机科学界对这项工作的认识很模糊,而生物界对它则完全是一无所知.

sentences.en: The totality of true thoughts is a picture of the world.
sentences.cn: 01所有真的思想的总和就构成了整个现实世界一幅图画.

sentences.en: The world is the totality of facts, not of things.
sentences.cn: 1世界是事实的总体, 而不是事物的总体.

sentences.en: Thus the " perfected denial of man " has taken charge of the totality of human existence.
sentences.cn: 因此, “ 对人性的完美的否定 ” 便已接管了人类存在的总体.

sentences.en: We must view things in their totality.
sentences.cn: 我们必须看事物的全部.
